snippet: Based on a 1997 documentary and opening at the La Jolla Playhouse in San Diego, the show has a creative team that includes Trey Anastasio of Phish and the Pulitzer- and Tony-winning playwright Doug Wright.
abstract: Based on a 1997 documentary and opening at the La Jolla Playhouse in San Diego, the show has a creative team that includes Trey Anastasio of Phish and the Pulitzer- and Tony-winning playwright Doug Wright.

headline.main: Keith Carradine Will Star in 'Hands on a Hardbody' Musical
headline.print_headline: Keith Carradine to Star In ‘Hardbody’ Onstage
